description: Provides an API gateway API resource.

Description.description: Specifies the description of the parameter. The description cannot exceed 255 characters.

Location.description: Specifies the parameter location, which can be 'PATH', 'QUERY' or 'HEADER'.

Name.description:
Specifies the parameter name. A parameter name consists of 1–32 characters, starting with a letter.
Only letters, digits, periods (.), hyphens (-), and underscores (_) are allowed.

Type.description: Specifies the parameter type, which can be 'REQUEST', 'CONSTANT', or 'SYSTEM'.

Value.description:
Specifies the parameter value, which is a string of not more than 255 characters.
The value varies depending on the parameter type:
- 'REQUEST': parameter name in `request_parameter`
- 'CONSTANT': real value of the parameter
- 'SYSTEM': gateway parameter name.

InvocationType.description: Specifies the invocation mode, which can be 'async' or 'sync'.

Timeout.description: Timeout duration (in ms) for API Gateway to request for FunctionGraph. Defaults to 50000.

Method.description: Specifies the backend request method, including 'GET','POST','PUT' and etc..

Protocol.description: Specifies the backend request protocol. The value can be 'HTTP' and 'HTTPS'.

Timeout.description: Timeout duration (in ms) for API Gateway to request for the backend service. Defaults to 50000.

Uri.description: Specifies the backend request path. The value must comply with URI specifications.

UrlDomain.description:
Specifies the backend service address. An endpoint URL is in the format of
"domain name (or IP address):port number", with up to 255 characters. This parameter and `vpc_channel` are alternative.

VpcChannel.description: Specifies the VPC channel ID. This parameter and `url_domain` are alternative.

Default.description: Specifies the default value when the parameter is optional.

Description.description: Specifies the description of the parameter. The description cannot exceed 255 characters.

Location.description: Specifies the input parameter location, which can be 'PATH', 'QUERY' or 'HEADER'.

Name.description:
Specifies the input parameter name. A parameter name consists of 1–32 characters, starting with a letter.
Only letters, digits, periods (.), hyphens (-), and underscores (_) are allowed.

Required.description: Specifies whether the parameter is mandatory or not.

Type.description: Specifies the input parameter type, which can be 'STRING' or 'NUMBER'.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

AuthType.description:
Specifies the security authentication mode.
The value can be 'App', 'IAM', and 'NONE'.

BackendType.description:
Specifies the service backend type. The value can be:
- 'HTTP': the web service backend
- 'FUNCTION': the FunctionGraph service backend
- 'MOCK': the Mock service backend.

Cors.description: Specifies whether CORS is supported or not.

Description.description:
Specifies the description of the API.
The description cannot exceed 255 characters.

ExampleFailureResponse.description:
Specifies the example response for a failed request
The length cannot exceed 20,480 characters.

ExampleSuccessResponse.description:
Specifies the example response for a successful request.
The length cannot exceed 20,480 characters.

GroupId.description:
Specifies the ID of the API group.
Changing this creates a new resource.

Name.description:
Specifies the name of the API. An API name consists of 3–64 characters,
starting with a letter. Only letters, digits, and underscores (_) are allowed.

RequestMethod.description: Specifies the request method, including 'GET','POST','PUT' and etc..

RequestProtocol.description:
Specifies the request protocol. The value can be 'HTTP', 'HTTPS', and 'BOTH'
which means the API can be accessed through both 'HTTP' and 'HTTPS'. Defaults to 'HTTPS'.

RequestUri.description: Specifies the request path of the API. The value must comply with URI specifications.

Tags.description: the tags of API in format of string list.

Version.description: Specifies the version of the API. A maximum of 16 characters are allowed.

Visibility.description:
Specifies whether the API is available to the public.
The value can be 1 (public) and 2 (private). Defaults to 2.
